bio: A creative professional having excellent written and presentation skills with an enormous experience in Assistant Director , actor , photographer, Media & Entertainment, TV programming & Creative writing. I understand the art of making things easy, simple and clear. Being creative in all aspects- technically, personally and artistically, I always attempt to incorporate creative ideas in my work.I have been in media and entertainment field for a few years now, working with News stories, Designing, Copy writing, Scripts, Concepts, Advertising and Camera & Editing.A creative person in spirit, with a passion for Cinema,  Writing, Photography and Creativity, I do experiment and try new things every day.Specialties:- Creative Direction, Copy writing, Script writing, Communication, Film Making, TV Programming.Acting is my passion and light, camera, action is my world........bala jee vishwanath Independent Director,Actor
